Header.Title: Living On The Edge: When Life Needs To Change
Header.Speaker: Dr. Don Wilson

ListItem.Quote: The churning inside me never stops...
Consider it pure joy, my brothers, whenever you face trials of many kinds, because you know that the testing of your faith develops perserverence.

ListItem.Paragraph: You have to make a DECISION
ListItem.Quote: As Jesus walked beside the Sea of Galilee, he saw Simon and his brother Andrew casting a net into the lake, for they were fishermen. 'Come, follow me.' Jesus said, 'and I will make you fishers of men.' At once they left their nets and followed him.
Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind.
Faith by itself, if it is not accompanied by action, is dead.
Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.

Note.Paragraph: TAKE AWAY: You can't change or be a change agent unless you're in COMMUNITY
